content:
Sure, here is the revised P.S and the next email in the sequence:

P.S. In the next email, we'll be diving into the least commonly known habits that can sabotage your weight loss journey. Did you know that energy balance and calorie deficit are the most important factors in weight loss? Make sure to keep an eye out for the next email, as we'll be sharing tips on how to make sure you're on the right track to sustainable weight loss.

Email 4:

Subject: "Don't Let These Habits Sabotage Your Weight Loss Journey"
